ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This study was supported by equipment from the Seeding Labs' 2012 Instrumental Access Grant SL2012-2 and MMV Challenge Grant MMV-12/0087 to Prof. Dr. Fabrice Fekam Boyom. The authors are grateful to Mr. Victor Nana from the National Herbarium of Cameroon for his assistance in plant collection and identification.
